scripts.cy:sequential: npm run cy:spec1 -- --browser chrome && npm run cy:spec2 -- --browser electron
scripts.cy:nokey:sequential: npm run cy:nokey:spec1 -- --browser chrome && npm run cy:nokey:spec2 -- --browser electron
scripts.cy:nokey:parallel: npm run cy:nokey:spec1 -- --browser chrome & npm run cy:nokey:spec2 -- --browser electron
scripts.cy:parallel: concurrently "npm run cy:spec1 -- --config-file cypress-13.config.js --browser chrome --group chrome --ci-build-id 14 --parallel" "npm run cy:spec2 -- --config-file cypress-24.config.js  --browser electron --group electron --ci-build-id 14 --parallel"
scripts.test: npm run clean:allure && npx cypress run --env allure=true && npm run generate:allure && npm run open:allure
